unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics Gets a Desi Twist**
normalised: **Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Follower Analytics Gets a Desi Twist**

unnormalised: Yo, Insta fam! Are your chai-time influencer strategies actually working? Time to ditch the guesstimates and get real with follower analytics!
normalised: Yo, Insta fam! Are your chai-time influencer strategies actually working? Time to ditch the guesstimates and get real with follower analytics!

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma from IIT-Delhi is dropping some serious knowledge on how to analyze your follower data like a pro. Forget just likes, we're talking demographics – are you reaching the right audience from Mumbai to Manipur? Are they even understanding your Hindi slang?
normalised: Doctor Sharma from I I T-Delhi is dropping some serious knowledge on how to analyze your follower data like a pro. Forget just likes, we're talking demographics – are you reaching the right audience from Mumbai to Manipur? Are they even understanding your Hindi slang?

unnormalised: New tools are popping up that let you track engagement down to the sq ft in specific areas. Imagine targeting that Diwali sale only to shoppers within a 5km radius of your store in Chandni Chowk!
normalised: New tools are popping up that let you track engagement down to the square foot in specific areas. Imagine targeting that Diwali sale only to shoppers within a five kilometer radius of your store in Chandni Chowk!

unnormalised: Rs. 5000 is all it takes to access some game-changing reports that tell you if Priya from Pune is more likely to buy your kurti than Rohan from Rajasthan.
normalised: Rupees five thousand is all it takes to access some game-changing reports that tell you if Priya from Pune is more likely to buy your kurti than Rohan from Rajasthan.

unnormalised: These insights can seriously boost your campaign ROI. Think of it like this: no more wasting your time chasing ghost followers.
normalised: These insights can seriously boost your campaign R O I. Think of it like this: no more wasting your time chasing ghost followers.

unnormalised: So, ditch the blind faith and embrace the data, yaars! It’s time to level up your influencer game and make those Rs. count! This could be the difference between a viral sensation and a flop.
normalised: So, ditch the blind faith and embrace the data, yaars! It's time to level up your influencer game and make those rupees count! This could be the difference between a viral sensation and a flop.
